DOC.brief_summary: We aim to compare the morphological and chromosomal features of human embryos cultured In Vitro versus those developed in a new In Vivo culture system with encapsulation in utero as well as implantation and pregnancy rate.
DOC.brief_title: Intrauterine Embryo Development With ANECOVA Device
DOC.criteria: Women age below 37 Hormonal serum levels within normal ranges (FSH, LH, E2, PRL, P4, T4, TSH) Negative serologic screening for HIV, Hep B and C No uterine or ovarian alterations found by ultrasound Normal BMI (19 29 kg/m2). At least 8 stage MII oocytes are not retrieved Endometriosis or PCO Severe male factor in the partner
